Very ruined game, i keep getting griffers and hackers in my matches. This is my 14th match in prime and i got a cheater in every game. Of course valve doesnt care cuz they already milked most of the money from this gay game.

Things I gave to Counter-Strike: 
1. Money 
2. Time 
3. Love

Things Counter-Strike gave me: 
1. Arthritis 
2. Rage 
3, Hatred of Russians, Spanish, and Russians 
4. Broken keyboard 
5. Broken mouse 
6. 9/10 ready 
7. Server crashes 
8. Retarded teammates 
9. Competitive matches 
10. "Ez Pz" spam 
11. Multilingual cursing - I guess this is a good thing? 
12. Lag 
13. Cheaters 
14. 64 tick servers
Essentially - CS is a greedy woman, but I love her all the time.
